Setup:
“将电源线连接到EQF1259。
将EQW1001的一端连接到EQF1259（BOSTON1）。 注意：确保您选择匹配控制台类型的正确端口。
将接地线（绿色）连接到EQF 1259的E-GND。

设置灯具配置：

使用PC将.xml配置文件加载到microSD卡中，该文件在RNDftp中的控制台名称下找到（例如：…RNDFtp \ EBNT02117 \ Procedure）。
将microSD卡面朝上插入microSD卡插槽中。
打开灯具背面的RESET按钮。
使用向上和向下按钮找到正确的配置文件。
按ENTER选择配置文件（屏幕1）。
当屏幕稳定时，请等待5秒钟，如下所示。

设置夹具脉冲：

按EQF1259 2x上的Display。
在此灯具上按开始
使用向上和向下按钮设置随机脉冲。
在灯具上按开始。
按一次显示。
”

Connect the power cord to the EQF1259. 
Connect one end of the EQW1001 to EQF1259 (BOSTON1). NOTE: MAKE SURE YOU SELECT THE CORRECT PORT THAT MATCH THE TYPE OF THE CONSOLE.   
Connect the ground wire (Green) to E-GND on EQF 1259. 

Set Fixture Configurations:

Using PC, load .xml configuration file, which is found in the RNDftp under the console name (Example: …RNDFtp\EBNT02117\Procedure) to the microSD card.
Insert the microSD card face up into the microSD card slot.
Turn on the RESET button at the back of the fixture.
Using the UP and DOWN buttons locate the proper configuration file.
Press ENTER to select the configuration file (Screen 1).
Wait for 5 seconds, when the screen is stable as below.

Set Fixture Pulse:

Press Display on the EQF1259 2x.
Press Start on this fixture
Using the up and down buttons, set a random pulse.
Press Start on the fixture.
Press Display once.
ESD Bag:
确认防静电包装袋已经耗尽，并按照图纸进行打印。

Verify that the ESD bag is dissipative and it is printed on as per the drawing.
Warning Label:
验证是否在控制台或脉冲条上打印了常规警告。

Verify that the General Warning is printed on the console or pulse bar.
Cosmetic, Color, and Texture:
“确认防静电袋是耗散的，并按照图纸打印。
确保将设备包装在防静电袋中。
目视检查控制台是否存在外观缺陷，物理损坏和难以辨认的打印。
验证控制台匹配图片
如果平板电脑有倾斜，请确认倾斜平稳移动，保持位置，并在整个范围内旋转。“

Verify that the ESD bag is dissipative and it is printed on as per the drawing.
Ensure the unit is packaged in an antistatic bag. 
Visually inspect the console for cosmetic defects, physical damage, and illegible printing.  
Verify console matches picture
If tablet has tilt, verify tilt  is smooth moving, holds position, and rotates through full range.
Power up:
“如果需要连接;脉冲条/手柄，扬声器，风扇，电视等。
将8针MTA连接到控制台。
在EQF1259上，打开控制台电源开关。“

Connect if needed; pulse bar/grips, speakers, fans, TV, etc.
Connect the 8-pin MTA to console.
On the EQF1259, turn on the Console power switch.
Safety Key:
将安全钥匙插入控制台。

Insert safety key into console.
Software Version:
“如果控制台显示”“WELCOME”“触摸iFit徽标”“>”“
触摸“”跳过“”
触摸“”继续，无需登录“”
触摸“”跳过“”
触摸屏幕左上角的用户个人资料图标
在下拉列表中，触摸设置
触摸“设备信息”，然后点击“应用信息”。这将显示App版本和Brainboard版本。
验证并记录。
按平板电脑上的后退箭头返回主屏幕
请注意，平板电脑上的每个选择都用扬声器的声音响应来表示。“

If console displays  "WELCOME" touch the iFit logo "›"
Touch "SKIP"
Touch "Continue without signing in"
Touch "SKIP"
Touch user profile icon at the upper left  of the screen
In drop down list, touch settings
Touch “Equipment Info” and then “App Info”. This will display App version and Brainboard version.
Verify and Record.
Press the back arrow on the tablet to return to main screen
Note that each selection made on the tablet was denoted with an audible response from the speakers.
Incline Calibration:
“触摸屏幕左上角的用户个人资料图标
在下拉列表中，触摸“设置”
触摸维护
选择Calibrate Incline
按EQF1259上的Calibrate
在平板电脑上按开始以开始倾斜校准。验证显示屏上的倾斜值是否会短暂增加，暂停，然后减少到零
校准完成后，按下数位板上的后退箭头返回主屏幕
请注意，平板电脑上的每个选择都用扬声器的声音响应来表示。“

Touch the user profile icon on upper left of the screen
In the drop down list, touch Settings
Touch Maintenance
Select Calibrate Incline
Press Calibrate on EQF1259
Press Begin on tablet to start incline calibration.  Verify the incline value on the display increases briefly, pauses, then decrease to zero
When calibration is complete, press the back arrow on the tablet to return to main screen
Note that each selection made on the tablet was denoted with an audible response from the speakers.
Display Test:
验证平板电脑显示屏是否亮起且没有缺陷

Verify tablet display is lit and without flaws.
Button Test:
“按下所有按钮，确认它们发出哔哔声。
确认先前步骤中所做的所有平板电脑选择都是用扬声器发出的声音响应来表示的。
“

Press all buttons and verify that they beep.
Verify that all tablet selections made in previous steps were denoted with an audible response from the speakers.
Drive Motor Output Test:
“在控制台上开始手动锻炼。
在控制台上，按随机快速按钮。
验证控制台和EQF1259上的速度是否匹配。“

Start manual workout on the console.
On the console, press random Quick speed buttons.
Verify that the Speed on the console and EQF1259 match.
Incline Motor Test:
“在控制台上，按随机快速倾斜按钮。
验证控制台上的倾斜和EQF1259匹配。“

On the console, press random Quick incline buttons.
Verify that the Incline on the console and EQF1259 match.
Chest Pulse Test:
“在EQF1259上，按显示按钮转到BLE脉冲屏幕。
按下开始按钮。
在控制台上运行手动锻炼。
验证在控制台上读取脉冲BLE脉冲。“

On the EQF1259, press Display button to goto BLE Pulse screen.
Press Start button.
Run manual workout on the console.
Verify pulse BLE pulse is read on console.
Fan Test:
“在控制台上，按大风扇按钮打开风扇，风扇应该低速运行。
再次按大风扇按钮，风扇应该运行在高位。
按小风扇按钮将风扇转到低位，然后再次按下以关闭风扇。“

On the console, press the Large Fan button to turn fan on. Fan should run on low.
Press the Large Fan button again and the fan should run on high.
Press the Small Fan button to turn fan to low, then press again to turn fan off.
Audio Test:
“将EQW1007连接到iOS音频源，并将EQW1007的另一端连接到控制台。
播放音频并验证它是否从控制台扬声器播放。
将音量调整到最小和最大水平并验证更改。
在音频设备上，进入蓝牙设置屏幕
按住BLE按钮3秒钟
在音频设备上，与“”ifit Audio“”配对并播放音频
在调音台上调节音量，音量会随着调节而改变
在音频设备上，进入蓝牙设置屏幕并断开并取消配对“”ifit Audio“”
连接耳机并将音量调整到最小值和最大值，并验证更改。“

Connect the EQW1007 to the iOS audio source and connect the other end of the EQW1007 to the console.
Play audio and verify that it plays out of the console speakers.
Adjust the volume to minimum and maximum level and verify a change.
On audio device, enter the bluetooth setup screen
Press and hold BLE button for 3 sec
On audio device, Pair with "ifit Audio" and play audio
Adjust volume on console and the audio level will change with respect to adjustment
On audio device, enter the bluetooth setup screen and disconnect and unpair "ifit Audio"
Connect headphones and adjust volume to minimum and maximum and verify a change.
Finish Test:
“通过触摸屏幕右下方的用户配置文件图标清除缓存
触摸设置
触摸维护
触摸Clear App Cache并选择“”YES“”和“”WELCOME“”将出现在显示屏上
等待10秒钟，然后在EQF1259上关闭控制台电源。
断开控制台上的所有电线和电缆。“

Clear cache by touch the user profile icon on lower right of the screen
Touch Settings
Touch Maintainance
Touch Clear App Cache and select "YES" and "WELCOME" will appear on display
Wait 10 seconds and then on the EQF1259, turn off the Console power.
Disconnect all wires and cables from the console.
